summary: The diff implements comprehensive responsive design using Tailwind CSS breakpoints (sm:, md:, lg:, xl:) across 15 modified files. All 8 requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-8) are addressed with responsive spacing, typography, touch targets, modals, cards, and navigation elements. Typography utilities were added to index.css, and components systematically apply responsive classes for padding, text sizes, button heights, and modal dimensions.
